org.daisy.pipeline.script

Class XProcScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.script.XProcScript

  • public final class XProcScript
extends Object
    XProcScript is an enhanced XProcPipeline with some extra information, such as production, port and options metadata.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XProcScript.Builder
      Builder for XProcScript objects.
